about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey inspired by the profound depths of Dante's 'The Divine Comedy' and the mysterious, cosmic dread of H.P. Lovecraft. Navigate through a world where classical myth meets unspeakable horror, and every step takes you closer to the dark truths lurking beyond the Void. In a classic 8-bit adventure filled with pixel art charm and Immersive challenges

Soulkeeper: Descend into Hell to become the savior of lost souls, battling forces from beyond the Void, on a harrowing quest through the nine layers of Hell.

As Dante, a courageous and determined hero, you must navigate treacherous environments filled with dangerous obstacles and deadly tentacles that seek to claim the souls of both Heaven and Hell. Your mission is clear: move platforms strategically, rescue the tormented spirits of good and evil, and guide them to safety.

Explore the 9 Layers of hell. Uncover the mysteries within each level, and confront a formidable boss at the climax of your perilous descent.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Gameplay: Experience a challenging mix of platforming, puzzle-solving, and fast-paced combat as you navigate through the treacherous layers of Hell.

  • Soul Management: Strategically move platforms to save souls from the clutches of tentacles threatening to extinguish their last glimmers of hope.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Engage in thrilling encounters with formidable bosses at the end of each Layer, each with unique mechanics and dark, twisted designs.

  • Uncover the Truth: Make your way into the 9 Layers of Hell to uncover the story behind the mysterious enemy seeking to devour the souls you strive to save.

  • Rewarding Relics: After defeating a Boss, receive powerful relics from Heaven or Hell to help you face the challenges ahead.

  • Artistic Visuals and Captivating Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of Hell's haunting landscapes, brought to life by beautiful 2D graphics inspired by NES visuals and a haunting, atmospheric soundtrack.

  • Dynamic Enemy Encounters: Face enemies that are randomly spawned, ensuring that no run is ever the same, keeping you on your toes with each attempt.

  • Extensive Gameplay: Battle your way through 66 levels, each filled with unique challenges and soul-saving opportunities.

  • Clicker Side Game: Engage in a clicker portion of the game where you can earn items and coins to upgrade your soul seeker, providing an additional layer of strategy and progression.

  • Experience and Power Leveling: Gain experience from defeating enemies and completing challenges to increase your power level, allowing you to grow stronger and face even greater threats.

  • Power-Ups: Utilize powerful upgrades like the Hell's Blazer, a fire particle that damages enemies over time, and Sacred Burst, a bomb power-up that delivers explosive, holy damage to multiple enemies. These power-ups are essential tools for overcoming the toughest obstacles in Hell.

  • Guardian of Souls: Descend into Hell, embark on a dark and transformative journey through the depths of Hell. Will you have the courage and stamina to save these tormented souls from their doom? Prepare to face forces beyond the known and become the ultimate guardian of souls in this unforgettable odyssey.

  • The Souls of Clicker Games: This game is difficult but fair, combining the essence of challenging "Souls-like" gameplay with a unique clicker mechanic. Are you ready to conquer Hell and become the true soul seeker?


Guardian of Souls: Descend into Hell, embark on a dark and transformative journey through the depths of hell. Will you have the courage and stamina to save these tormented souls from their doom? Prepare to face forces beyond the known and become the ultimate guardian of souls in this unforgettable odyssey.

movies.name: Heaven and Hell vs The Void Teaser Trailer

name: Heaven & Hell vs The Void

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: 2Ghz or faster processer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Version 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Descend into Hell, save lost souls! Inspired by Dante's Inferno, rescue tormented spirits, battle monsters from the void, and confront powerful bosses. Beautiful 2D visuals, harrowing journey. Will you rise as the ultimate Soulkeeper?"
